Package com.hexanome16.client.screens.lobby

Class LobbyFactory

java.lang.Object
com.hexanome16.client.screens.lobby.LobbyFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.almasb.fxgl.entity.EntityFactory
public class LobbyFactory extends Object implements com.almasb.fxgl.entity.EntityFactory
This class is used to create the entities of the lobby screen.
